name: A Backwards Journey
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2023.

A journey that traces back the development cycle of the game. Follow the wandering of our main character retracing back the road that made them what they are now, finding their roots and how the game came to be. ___________________________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Movement: ->WASD
  • Health Potion: ->E
  • Fire Ball: ->RMB
  • Melee Attack: ->LMB
  • Ultimate Attack: ->Q
  • Shield: ->X
  • Jump: ->Spacebar
  • Run: ->Shift
